alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:37AM EDT until June 26 at 9:15AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Columbia County in central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... Central Sullivan County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 915 AM EDT. * At 836 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Muncy, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Montoursville, Muncy, Hughesville, Montgomery, Jamison City, Kettle Creek Gorge, Lairdsville, Central, Biggertown, Muncy Valley, Barbours and Loyalsockville. This includes Interstate 180 from mile markers 11 to 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in State College PA.
